name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-tab-support-offline-nodejs
title: A classic CRUD app working in offline mode inside Microsoft Teams.
shortDescription: This sample app demonstrates a CRUD application that functions offline in Microsoft Teams, allowing users to manage data without an internet connection and automatically sync with blob storage when reconnected.
longDescription: The Offline Support Tickets sample app showcases a classic CRUD application designed for Microsoft Teams, enabling users to perform create, read, update, and delete operations without needing an internet connection. When the device reconnects, the app seamlessly syncs all locally stored data with blob storage, ensuring data consistency across devices.
